ruleContent:
<js>
var vid = result.match(/id="vpath">([^"]+)<\/span>/)[1];
var img = result.match(/id="purl">([^"]+)\/span/)[1];
var vservers = ["https://v.8axb.com/v/","https://v.8cru.com/v/","https://v.8cud.com/v/","https://v.8dcd.com/v/","https://v.8dbu.com/v/","https://v.8cwa.com/v/","https://v.8dwd.com/v/","https://v.8ehe.com/v/","https://v.8eba.com/v/","https://v.8exu.com/v/"];
var vsp = vservers[Math.floor(Math.random()*vservers.length)]; 
var video = vsp+vid;
var result="<video src=\""+video+"\" width=\"100%\" height=\"320px\" controls=\"controls\"  poster=\""+img+"\"></video>";

"<html><head><meta charset=\"utf-8\"><title>8X影视</title><style>body\{background-color:\#ffffff\}</style></head>"+ "<body>"+result+"</body></html>"
</js>
